thread.title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang asked if he’ll join Liverpool… here’s his response
thread.title_full: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang asked if he’ll join Liverpool… here’s his response

title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang asked if he’ll join Liverpool… here’s his response
text:
Published 20th January 2017 
The Borussia Dortmund star, 27, is one of the most highly-rated strikers in world football. 
Competition to sign him is expected to be fierce in the summer with AC Milan and Real Madrid both in the frame. 
The Gabon frontman has this week admitted he could leave this summer. 
But when asked if he would reunite with former coach Jurgen Klopp, Aubameyang said: “I don't think that'll happen." Top 20 Liverpool transfers ever Wednesday, 7th October 2015 STARSPORT bring you the 20 best transfers in Liverpool's history. 1 / 20 GETTY 20. Jamie Redknapp made a name for himself at the Kop where he arrived in 1991 and served in midfield for 237 matches 
Aubameyang also vowed not to follow Mario Gotze, Robert Lewandowski and Mats Hummels by swapping Dortmund for their fierce rivals Bayern Munich. 
He said: “I would never join Bayern. 
“That's for sure. That would be too hard on the Dortmund fans. Whatever they'd offer me, I'd say no.” 
Aubemeyang has scored 16 goals in 15 Bundesliga games this season. 
GETTY Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has hinted he could leave Borussia Dortmund 
He added: "Nobody can foresee the future. 
"I love it at Dortmund, but I can't say that I'll stay for two more years, or five or 10. 
“It's possible that a club could reach an agreement with Dortmund in June and I'll go. 
"I want to be honest: When you are ambitious and also want to see something else... it's difficult to talk about. 
“Some players have ambitions, and therefore they leave and want to experience something new, you know." Related articles
